p:
The model does not treat the effects of seasonality, CO 2, humidity, light capture, or vegetation and soil types explicitly
37 . However, we chose this method, because it allowed for a direct comparison with the results of the metapopulation model. Given the lack of detailed data about NPP during the Holocene, the Miami model provides a good first-order characterization of the major climatic controls on ecosystem productivity during the past 12,000 years.
